department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程旨在深入探索不同的組織理論，並培養博士班學生批判性思維和理論應用能力。透過對經典與當代組織理論的研討和分析，學生將掌握如何在研究中運用這些理論框架來解釋組織現象，並開展原創性研究。
goal.en:
This seminar involves a set of critical theoretical perspectives (theories) in management, encompassing the following domains: what is organizational theory, a behavioral theory of the firm, resource-based view, learning, and knowledge-based view, time perspective, corporate governance, agency theory, upper-echelons perspective, and organizational changes, competitive dynamics perspective. Our approach will typically review the classic works on an assigned topic and examine in-depth recent empirical works. The purpose of this Ph.D. level seminar is to acquaint students with the theories and research in the management field.

In the class, we intend to accomplish the following:
1.To learn the theoretical perspectives (theories) in management.
2.To critically evaluate and extend current research on a specific theory.
3.To develop and promote an original research idea through the preparation of a research proposal.

The success of the course depends on each student pulling his or her own weight in both the term project and the discussions in class.

outline.ch: 本課程將涵蓋組織理論中的一系列關鍵理論觀點，包含以下主題：什麼是組織理論、企業行為理論、資源基礎觀點、學習與知識基礎觀點、時間觀點理論、公司治理、代理理論、高層理論、組織變革、競爭動態觀點等。
outline.en: This seminar involves a set of critical theoretical perspectives (theories) in management, encompassing the following domains: what is organizational theory, a behavioral theory of the firm, resource-based view, learning, and knowledge-based view, time perspective, corporate governance, agency theory, upper-echelons perspective, and organizational changes, competitive dynamics perspective.
